submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, arr: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(arr)
        arr *= 2
        cur = sum(arr[i] != arr[i+1] for i in range(k-1))
        ans = 1 if cur == k-1 else 0
        for i in range(1, n):
            cur -= arr[i] != arr[i-1]
            cur += arr[i+k-1] != arr[i+k-2]
            ans += cur == k-1
        return ans
